manifests.contents:
[package]
name = "tasker-core"
edition = "2021"
version = "0.0.1"
authors = ["Pete Taylor <pete.jc.taylor@hey.com>"]
description = "High-performance Rust core for workflow orchestration, designed to complement the Rails Tasker engine"
readme = "README.md"
keywords = ["workflow", "orchestration", "task", "async", "performance"]
categories = ["concurrency", "database", "web-programming"]
license = "MIT"
repository = "https://github.com/tasker-systems/tasker-core"

[workspace]
members = [".", "tasker-shared", "tasker-orchestration", "tasker-worker", "pgmq-notify"]

[workspace.dependencies]
anyhow = "1.0"
async-trait = "0.1"
axum = "0.7"
cargo-llvm-cov = "0.6"
config = "0.15"
crossbeam = "0.8"
dotenvy = "0.15"
factori = "1.1"
fastrand = "2.0"
futures = "0.3"
mockall = "0.13"
nextest = "0.1.1"
opentelemetry = "0.27"
opentelemetry-otlp = "0.27"
parking_lot = "0.12"
pgmq = "0.30.1"
proptest = "1.0"
rand = "0.9.1"
regex = "1.0"
serde_json = "1.0"
serde_yaml = "0.9"
serial_test = "3.1"
structured-logger = "1.0"
sysinfo = "0.31"
tempfile = "3.0"
thiserror = "2.0"
tokio-test = "0.4"
toml = "0.8"
tracing = "0.1"
tracing-appender = "0.2"
url = "2.0"

[workspace.dependencies.axum-extra]
version = "0.9"
features = ["typed-header"]

[workspace.dependencies.bigdecimal]
version = "0.4"
features = ["serde"]

[workspace.dependencies.chrono]
version = "0.4.38"
features = ["serde"]

[workspace.dependencies.criterion]
version = "0.5.1"

[workspace.dependencies.insta]
version = "1.34"
features = ["serde", "json"]

[workspace.dependencies.jsonwebtoken]
version = "9"

[workspace.dependencies.reqwest]
version = "0.12"
features = ["json", "rustls-tls"]

[workspace.dependencies.rsa]
version = "0.9"

[workspace.dependencies.rust_decimal]
version = "1.37"
features = ["serde-with-str"]

[workspace.dependencies.serde]
version = "1.0"
features = ["derive"]

[workspace.dependencies.sqlx]
version = "0.8"
features = ["runtime-tokio-rustls", "postgres", "uuid", "chrono", "json", "bigdecimal", "macros", "migrate"]

[workspace.dependencies.tokio]
version = "1.46"
features = ["full"]

[workspace.dependencies.tower]
version = "0.4"

[workspace.dependencies.tower-http]
version = "0.5"
features = ["cors", "trace", "timeout"]

[workspace.dependencies.tracing-subscriber]
version = "0.3"
features = ["env-filter", "json"]

[workspace.dependencies.utoipa]
version = "4.2"
features = ["axum_extras", "chrono", "uuid"]

[workspace.dependencies.utoipa-swagger-ui]
version = "7.1"
features = ["axum"]

[workspace.dependencies.uuid]
version = "1.11"
features = ["v4", "v7", "serde"]

[workspace.dependencies.workspace_tools]
version = "0.2.0"
features = ["full"]

[lib]
path = "src/lib.rs"
name = "tasker_core_rs"
plugin = false
proc-macro = false
edition = "2021"
required-features = []
crate-type = ["lib"]

[profile.release]
opt-level = 3
lto = true
codegen-units = 1
panic = "abort"

[profile.release.package]

[profile.dev]
opt-level = 0
debug = true

[profile.dev.package]

[profile.coverage]
debug = true
inherits = "dev"
codegen-units = 1
incremental = false
overflow-checks = false

[profile.coverage.package]

[package]
name = "pgmq-notify"
edition = "2021"
version = "0.0.1"
authors = ["Pete Taylor <pete.jc.taylor@hey.com>"]
description = "PG Notify layer for PGMQ"
license = "MIT"

[dependencies.anyhow]
workspace = true

[dependencies.async-trait]
workspace = true

[dependencies.bigdecimal]
workspace = true

[dependencies.chrono]
workspace = true

[dependencies.config]
workspace = true

[dependencies.criterion]
workspace = true
optional = true

[dependencies.dotenvy]
workspace = true

[dependencies.fastrand]
workspace = true

[dependencies.futures]
workspace = true

[dependencies.pgmq]
workspace = true

[dependencies.rand]
workspace = true

[dependencies.regex]
workspace = true

[dependencies.rust_decimal]
workspace = true

[dependencies.serde]
workspace = true

[dependencies.serde_json]
workspace = true

[dependencies.serde_yaml]
workspace = true

[dependencies.sqlx]
workspace = true
optional = true

[dependencies.structured-logger]
workspace = true

[dependencies.sysinfo]
workspace = true

[dependencies.thiserror]
workspace = true

[dependencies.tokio]
workspace = true

[dependencies.toml]
workspace = true

[dependencies.tracing]
workspace = true

[dependencies.tracing-appender]
workspace = true

[dependencies.tracing-subscriber]
workspace = true

[dependencies.uuid]
workspace = true

[dependencies.workspace_tools]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.cargo-llvm-cov]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.factori]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.insta]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.mockall]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.nextest]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.proptest]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.serial_test]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.tempfile]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.tokio-test]
workspace = true

[dev-dependencies.url]
workspace = true

[features]
default = []

[lib]
path = "src/lib.rs"
name = "pgmq_notify"
plugin = false
proc-macro = false
edition = "2021"
required-features = []
crate-type = ["rlib"]

[package]

edition = "2021"
version = "0.0.1"

[features]
benchmarks = ["criterion"]
default = ["postgres", "test-utils"]
postgres = ["sqlx/postgres"]
test-utils = []

[[bench]]
path = "benches/shared_benchmarks.rs"
name = "shared_benchmarks"
plugin = false
proc-macro = false
harness = false
edition = "2021"
required-features = ["benchmarks"]

[[test]]
path = "tests/config.rs"
name = "config"
plugin = false
proc-macro = false
edition = "2021"
required-features = []

[[test]]
path = "tests/constants_test.rs"
name = "constants_test"
plugin = false
proc-macro = false
edition = "2021"
required-features = []

[[test]]

required-features = []

[[test]]
path = "tests/factory_tests.rs"
name = "factory_tests"

proc-macro = false
edition = "2021"
required-features = []

[[test]]
path = "tests/integration_tests.rs"
name = "integration_tests"

required-features = []

[[test]]
path = "tests/millisecond_config_integration_test.rs"
name = "millisecond_config_integration_test"
plugin = false
proc-macro = false
edition = "2021"
required-features = []

[[test]]
path = "tests/scope_ordering_test.rs"

plugin = false

[[test]]

[[test]]

plugin = false
proc-macro = false
edition = "2021"

[lib]
path = "src/lib.rs"
name = "tasker_shared"
plugin = false
proc-macro = false
edition = "2021"
required-features = []
crate-type = ["rlib"]

postgres = ["sqlx/postgres"]
test-utils = []
web-api = ["axum", "axum-extra", "tower", "tower-http", "jsonwebtoken", "rsa", "utoipa", "utoipa-swagger-ui"]

[[bin]]
path = "src/bin/server.rs"
name = "tasker-server"
plugin = false
proc-macro = false
edition = "2021"
required-features = ["web-api"]

[[bench]]
path = "benches/orchestration_benchmarks.rs"
name = "orchestration_benchmarks"

proc-macro = false
